title: I've been strugling to find out what is the font used in this picture. Sth/St/Seaport and Water Front, any ideas what it is would help alot!
author: orlando

comments.content: The "STH/ST/SPRT" looks like [Replica Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725024348/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Replica/). Not sure about the serif...
...And just checked that: "WATER FRONT" appears to be [Charter](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725024348/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/charter/charter/).
